DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether physiologic measure ( peak cough flow , measure respiratory muscle strength include MIP , MEP , SNIP , spirometry ) predict spontaneous cough clearance ( measure nuclear medicine study ) child neuromuscular disease . It also determine whether airway clearance augment high frequency chest wall oscillation .
DOC.brief_title: Peak Cough Flow Cough Clearance Patients With Muscular Dystrophy
DOC.criteria: Age 621 ; able cooperate study procedure Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy OR Becker Muscular Dystrophy Need mechanical ventilation day Recent ( within 2 week ) low respiratory tract infection
